content.html: Even if Twitter dies, almost nobody is going to jump ship to a decentralized platform like Mastadon. Too many people crave a centralized network. They want the Network Effect. They depend on it to attract customers.
content.value:
Even if Twitter dies, almost nobody is going to jump ship to a decentralized platform like Mastadon.

Too many people crave a centralized network. They want the Network Effect. They depend on it to attract customers.
